CodeExample.Title: Get the User's Birthday property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the User's Birthday property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/users/<User.objectId>/Birthday HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the //myOrganization/users/ URL to get the User entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the Birthday property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=Birthday query option to the //myOrganization/users/ entity-getting URL to retrieve the Birthday property value
